meal_plans.meal_name: Budget Rice Kheer (No Nuts, Low Sodium)
researched_ingredients: 1 liter full fat milk (or low-fat for lower calorie)
1/4 cup (50g) basmati rice, rinsed and soaked
Optional pinch saffron for flavor (minimal cost)

shopping_tips: Buy small packs of rice and sugar to stay within budget and avoid waste.
Use whole cardamom pods from produce section and grind at home to save cost over pre-powdered.
Skip saffron if budget tight; cardamom alone gives good flavor.
Check expiry on milk for freshness; opt for loose milk if cheaper.
Shop during evening sales for dairy discounts in local stores.
